Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Lt. Gary A. Scott Memorial Highway"
Summary: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Lt. Gary A. Scott Memorial Highway" in the town of LeRoy, county of Genesee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Lt. Gary A. Scott Memorial Highway"
